title: Bloomberg Markets: Denning on Oil Sliding Into Bear Market
itunes:title: Bloomberg Markets: Denning on Oil Sliding Into Bear Market
description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson. GUEST: Liam Denning Energy, Mining and Commodities Columnist Bloomberg Gadfly Discussing U.S. stocks retreating from all-time highs as crude oil sliding into a bear market Tuesday on concern the global supply glut will persist.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
